AbstractText.sentence: Interferon-gamma (IFN-gamma) modulates the expression of several cytokines by human monocytes at the transcriptional level.

AbstractText.sentence: Priming of human monocytes with IFN-gamma resulted in the down regulation of c-fos and c-jun mRNA in response to stimulation with lipopolysaccharide (LPS) compared to the effects of LPS alone.
